laboratory_examinations.findings: Right frontal cortical infarct and several bilateral subcortical infarcts.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At age 29, new brain infarctions in right middle cerebral artery territory were revealed by MRI.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Occlusion of the internal carotid arteries distal to the origin of the ophthalmic artery with moyamoya vessels.
Severe and nonspecific dilated cardiomyopathy with depressed LVFS from unknown origin.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: From this time, he was hospitalized several times for recurrent episodes of heart failure and recurrent neurologic deficits.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Evidence of hypergonadotropic hypogonadism, partial GH deficiency, normal levels of PRL, TSH, T4, and cortisol.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Partial growth hormone (GH) insufficiency remained significant despite the normalization of gonadotropin levels after testosterone treatment.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Insulin tolerance test for GH response
laboratory_examinations.findings: GH peak response indicated partial deficiency with highest levels reached at 90 minutes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Insulin tolerance test was prematurely stopped because of severe symptomatic hypoglycemia.
